dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 Organic Soil Carbon and Nitrogen Data (Zinke et al.)
title: SAFARI 2000 Organic Soil Carbon and Nitrogen Data (Zinke et al.)
summary: This data set contains a subset of the Worldwide Organic Soil Carbon and Nitrogen (Zinke et al. 1986) data set for southern Africa. The data were obtained from soil surveys by Zinke and soil survey literature. The main samples for laboratory analyses were collected at uniform soil increments and included bulk density determinations.&

citation: Campbell, A., Lysenko, L, Hughes, A. Gibbs, H., (2008). Carbon Storage in Protected Areas-Technical Report.
